name: Eldritch Slam
text: While the Tigers head holds you down, the Rams head pummels you mercilessly

name: Onslaught
text: A casted fireball, A sword to the chest, and the puncturing wounds of spider legs, all instantaneously.

name: Ghostly Ambush
text: You don't know what it was, but you do know it is your blood.

name: Crush
text: Never fight under a mammoth. Moreso under a mammoth's foot.

name: Demonic Claw
text: The Vrock swoops, its claws peel through flesh as if it was water.

name: Fire Twister
text: The Wyvern launches a fireball, swiftly splitting it in two and with a burst from its wings launches you in two whirling firestorms.

name: Glaive
text: The Oni transforms an arm into a massive glaive, sweeping it across your neck.

name: Indestructible
text: The Warforged monster reaches for your arm while accidentally snapping your leg.

name: Trebuchet
text: Seemingly from across the world, A boulder is thrown with exact precision, obliterating your body.

name: Binding
text: You feel snakelike chains begin to swarm your body, unable to fend them off before you are crushed.

name: Phantasms
text: Three Cloakers appear before you, unable to track the real Cloaker, you quickly succumb to its wretched psychic howels.

name: Frozen Slam
text: The Frost Giant picks you up and slams you onto the ground. It wasn't hard.

name: Stench
text: The odor of death permeates from this creature; so unbearable you are unable to keep your countenance.

name: Venomous Spray
text: The Naga takes a bite of your leg, as the creature releases you see the not even the massive wound could contain this amount of venom.
